content.raw:
I just made the next prerelease of ignition-cmake with version 0.1.1:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/commits/835c374fc1cd53846b0c8855e2b9c2ddc6d4f7c9?at=ignition-cmake_0.1.1

I wasn't able to use the `~pre1` suffix like was used in ignition-math4 prior to merging ignition-cmake support:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/commits/e48d6fc0ba840e9e391790f9a04f1a272667112c?at=ignition-math4_4.0.0%7Epre1

This functionality would be kinda helpful for making prereleases so we can distinguish the prerelease tags from real tags.
content.html:
I just made the next prerelease of ignition-cmake with version 0.1.1:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/commits/835c374fc1cd53846b0c8855e2b9c2ddc6d4f7c9?at=ignition-cmake_0.1.1

I wasn't able to use the ~pre1 suffix like was used in ignition-math4 prior to merging ignition-cmake support:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/commits/e48d6fc0ba840e9e391790f9a04f1a272667112c?at=ignition-math4_4.0.0%7Epre1

This functionality would be kinda helpful for making prereleases so we can distinguish the prerelease tags from real tags.
